metadata.title: CVE-2016-5598 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connector component 2.1.3 andearlier and 2.0.4 and earlier in Oracle MySQL allows remote attackers toaffect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related toConnector/Python.

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
